Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#It's Kent...$2#$b#I love him and I'm so glad he's finally home but...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "Ever since he got back, he just... he hasn't been the same person.$2#$b#He never laughs anymore. He won't talk to me. He practically ignores Vincent and Samantha. He hardly eats any food. We haven't had-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "He's opened up a little about some of the horrors he experienced. The things he's seen. The friends he lost. What he went through when he was captured...$2#$b#Yesterday, Vincent was watching a cartoon and he accidently pushed a button on the remote and made the TV go static.$2#$b#Kent immediately fell to the floor and put his hands over his head...$2#$b#Later, he told me that at his base, the TV screens would go to static right before an alarm sounded. When they heard it, everyone knew they had to take cover.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Harvey gave him some medicine that should help with the symptoms of PTSD.$2#$b#I can't tell if it's made a difference.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*sniff*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "He's hurting so much, and I don't know how to help him, @. I feel helpless...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Kent needs you now more than ever.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#You might want to look for a therapist in Zuzu or Pine-Mesa City."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#I'm sorry, @. I had all of that bottled up, and I might have said too much.$2#$b#Thank you for listening to me. You, Olivia, and Caroline are my closest friends, and you're always there for me$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "I hope one day I can be there for you, too.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event3#If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#With a combined effort, there's nothing you two can't accomplish."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'll follow the advice you gave me.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "I need to finish watering these flowers, okay? I'll talk to you later. Thank you again.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Thank you for talking to me earlier, @. I know what to do to help Kent. I think things will be better soon.$0"
